com.bigdata.rdf.sail.sparql

Class BigdataASTContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.rdf.sail.sparql.BigdataASTContext

  • public class BigdataASTContext
extends Object
    Object provides context required in various stages of parsing queries or updates.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Field Detail

      • valueFactory

        protected final BigdataValueFactory valueFactory

      • vocab

        protected final Map<org.openrdf.model.Value,BigdataValue> vocab
        A mapping of parsed RDF Values and well known vocabulary items used when generating the AST to resolved BigdataValues. This includes everything which was parsed plus certain well-known items such as RDF.FIRST, RDF.REST, and RDF.NIL which are only used when handling syntactic sugar constructions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BigdataASTContext

        public BigdataASTContext(Map<org.openrdf.model.Value,BigdataValue> values)
        Parameters:
        values - A map from the distinct RDF Value objects in the QUERY or UPDATE request to the corresponding BigdataValue objects that will be used to process the request.

    • Method Detail

      • createAnonVar

        protected VarNode createAnonVar(String varName)
        Create an anonymous variable. The variable name will be unique (within the scope of the query parser) and VarNode.isAnonymous() will return true.
        Parameters:
        varName - The prefix of the name of an anonymous variable. This should have the pattern -foo-. An unique (within query) variable identifier will be appended to the prefix.
        Returns:
        The anonymous variable.

      • createConstVar

        protected ConstantNode createConstVar(org.openrdf.model.Value value)
                               throws VisitorException
        Return a constant for a pre-defined vocabulary item.
        Throws:
        VisitorException

        Return a new variable for a SID (Statement Identifier)
